{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/title|static_extent}}
{{cpp/container/mdspan/extents/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
static constexpr std::size_t static_extent( rank_type i ) noexcept;
}}

Returns static extent size of an {{rlpt|/|extents}} at the rank index {{c|i}}. If the rank index {{c|i}} is a dynamic extent, returns {{lc|std::dynamic_extent}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|The rank index to get the static extent size of}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The static extent size or {{lc|std::dynamic_extent}} value.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;mdspan&gt;

int main()
{
    std::extents&lt;int, 1, 2&gt; e1;
    std::extents&lt;int, 3, std::dynamic_extent, std::dynamic_extent&gt; e2(4, 5);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; e1.static_extent(0) &lt;&lt; ", " &lt;&lt; e1.static_extent(1) &lt;&lt; '\n';
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (e2.static_extent(0) == std::dynamic_extent) &lt;&lt; ", "
              &lt;&lt; (e2.static_extent(1) == std::dynamic_extent) &lt;&lt; ", "
              &lt;&lt; (e2.static_extent(2) == std::dynamic_extent) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
1, 2
0, 1, 1
}}
